0100011100110111 1101010100101101 0 -> sum: 0001110001100100, cout: 1
1000001000110001 0110000011111000 1 -> sum: 1110001100101010, cout: 0
1100101001101001 1100101100011011 1 -> sum: 1001010110000101, cout: 1

0000101010101100 1010100110000001 0 -> sum: 1011010000101101, cout: 0
1100001100010110 0100100000100001 1 -> sum: 0000101100111000, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
